title: NotHatinJustTrollin
author: NotHatinJustTrollin
created_time: November 01, 2023, 04:49:01 PMLast edit: January 01, 2024, 07:21:55 PM by NotHatinJustTrollin
content: Top 10 Gainers Among Tokens Last 24 Hours - 1st Jan, 2024Excluded tokens with trading volume 24h < $10M1. Keep3rV1 - Keep3r Network is a decentralized keeper network for projects that need external devops and for external teams to find keeper jobs.2. Alchemix - Alchemix token is the governance token for the Alchemix protocol.3. Prosper - Prosper is a non-custodial cross-chain prediction market and hedging platform.4. Perpetual Protocol - Perpetual Protocol is a decentralized perpetual contract protocol for every asset, made possible by a Virtual Automated Market Maker.5. 1inch - 1inch is a decentralized exchange aggregator and liquidity protocol to help users discover the best trade prices for tokens.6. MetisDAO - Metis is a Layer2 infrastructure to backbone the running of the Web 3.0 economy.7. Wing Finance - Wing is a credit-based, cross-chain DeFi lending platform.8. Sei - Sei Network is an L1 blockchain with a built-in on-chain orderbook that allows smart contracts access to shared liquidity.9. The Graph - The Graph is a protocol for building decentralized applications quickly on Ethereum and IPFS using GraphQL.10. BakerySwap - BakerySwap is an AMM Dex on the Binance Smart Chain.All the information comes from Cryptorank.io . When you view this picture, the prices may have changed, so please make sure to check the current prices before clicking on the BUY button.

comments.author: NotHatinJustTrollin
comments.body: Top 10 Gainers Among Tokens Last 24 Hours - 2nd Jan, 2024Excluded tokens with trading volume 24h < $10M1. AmazingTeamDAO - AmazingTeamDao is the governance and application token of the ADOGE game, the Metaverse blockchain game.2. Legends of Elumia - Legends of Elumia is a Play to Earn, NFT based Massively Multiplayer Online game on PC and mobile.3. Lisk - A Blockchain application platform that supports developers to build blockchain applications written in JavaScript.4. Ordiswap - Ordiswap is a Automated Market Maker (AMM) deployed on Bitcoin's native layer.5. Myro - Myro is a viral narrative based on Solana Co-Founder Raj Gokal’s pet dog.6. Perpetual Protocol - Perpetual Protocol is a decentralized perpetual contract protocol for every asset, made possible by a Virtual Automated Market Maker.7. Skale - Ethereum native, modular blockchain network.8. Velo - Velo is a blockchain based financial protocol enabling digital credit issuance and borderless asset transfer for businesses.9. Gains Network - Gains Network is the first decentralized leverage trading platform on Polygon.10. Raydium - Raydium offers DeFi and AMM projects a clear path for bridging platforms and liquidity with the evolved capabilities of Solana and Serum.All the information comes from Cryptorank.io . When you view this picture, the prices may have changed, so please make sure to check the current prices before clicking on the BUY button.

comments.author: tjtonmoy
comments.body: I don't see any reputable coins or tokens in here. Some of them are, actually most of them I have never heard of. I am a guy who likes to take it safe and not risk everything on something new which may or may not have potential to grow in the future. Despite being the top gainers in the last 24 hours, anything could happen to them at any given time. Researching something new in the altcoin market seems like hassle and west of time to me. They could actually have potential but as everything goes with altcoin, when the trend or hype is over, the project is most likely dead. Thank you for bringing up the topic but I don't think this will do any good for me. The price pump could happen anytime given the current market situation. For that reason, try to stick with something reputable which can take you a long way. And if you are able to take the advantage of the recent market condition, then sure you should take it. Just a little reminder, don't blindly buy anything that shows green right now. Anything that goes up counts down as well.

comments.author: Ben Barubal
comments.body: I only like one of the things you did, and that is bake or bakery sweep. The rest, I don't hold them in the majority, even for short-term holdings. I don't want to hold them for now; maybe in the future I can. It depends if I see something good develop in their coins themselves.  Because mostly my basis is the top 20 listed on Coinmarketcap and Coingecko, these two platforms are often used to find potential crypto assets and then hold them for the long term. I also have other holdings for the short term to also get profit every day.

comments.author: electronicash
comments.body: tokens are so new. i hardly knew them. but haven't heard of that Lisk since forever. this project is totally forgotten already and then suddenly surfaces among the top gainers, i wonder if there was a development news of this project that triggered this gain. i remember the project was about SDK and it is one of the oldest projects that did an ICO. and also the Graph i remember was one of the most funded ICO but after years its price is still $0.21.  where is the website of that blackreport?

comments.author: batang_bitcoin
comments.body: Lisk was like the oldest here. But ever since it has been launched, the value of it is still the same and even lower from the time it was launched. The ATH of it definitely is high but I doubt it that with pumps like this will make it have a return. I just think that because a coin has pumped, people should invest on it already. Don't get yourselves into FOMO because that will give you a certain loss.

comments.author: FinePoine0
comments.body: I wanted to invest in Bakery Swap tokens but I saw on Binance that it pumped just a few days ago. Such highs were at the dumping stage, holding for a long time at 0.08 cents, but only briefly pumping to 0.92 cents. But the current price is now at 0.48 cents, if there is some downside from the current price then I will definitely invest.

I do not even know which of them has potential, so congrats if you invested in all of these but be careful, it will become shitcoin without knowing you.

comments.author: JeffBrad12
comments.body: 1inch increase was imminent its highly under appreciated within these bullrun around that it makes me wonder why this coin hasn't gone to the level of the other like uniswap and swap platform token like in solana.so basically this increase was expected. but never i thought that sei could perform this good even leaving sui, goes to show that the team behind sei more committed than sui in this case if they are increasing further its no wonder.after this increase i've taken some profit and now trying to find new coin out there that might still not pumping but I guess its gonna be difficult journey since seeing in CMC based on 90 days stats there's quite literally none of the coin that hasn't increased yet and im talking about the coin that have good quality that are not just some pump and dump coin but real blockchain coin even L1 or L2 like sei or matic, if anyone can know one, feel free to share.

comments.author: Sayeds56
comments.body: Thanks for sharing this useful information. It's worth noting that the tokens highlighted in your post may not be widely recognized except few of them like 1Inch, Sei and Bakeryswap, in the crypto space and their historical trading volume in particular has not been so significant. It is crucial to understand that currently cryptocurrencies market is in initial stage of an upward trend, and during such phase almost all alscoins tend to exhibit momentum due to increased interest of general public in crypto space. Therefore, conduct comprehensive research on a coin or token before making investment decision.

comments.author: Publictalk792
comments.body: This didn't surprised me. Mostly are the new coins. Some of them are old like Raydium Lisk and 1inch. Others are new. And New coins mostly perform well in early stages. And after that they dump and never come up. One of them a project is good which I think can perform more. And that is Sei. I think this can go $1+ easily in the next bull run. I am holding some Sei and I really hope that this coin will give me good profit in future. Finally Bitcoin crossed 45k and soon it will cross 50k milestone. And Altcoins will perform much well in this season.

comments.author: Kelward
comments.body: Quote from: tjtonmoy on January 02, 2024, 04:36:37 PMI don't see any reputable coins or tokens in here. Some of them are, actually most of them I have never heard of. I am a guy who likes to take it safe and not risk everything on something new which may or may not have potential to grow in the future. Despite being the top gainers in the last 24 hours, anything could happen to them at any given time. Researching something new in the altcoin market seems like hassle and west of time to me. They could actually have potential but as everything goes with altcoin, when the trend or hype is over, the project is most likely dead. Thank you for bringing up the topic but I don't think this will do any good for me. The price pump could happen anytime given the current market situation. For that reason, try to stick with something reputable which can take you a long way. And if you are able to take the advantage of the recent market condition, then sure you should take it. Just a little reminder, don't blindly buy anything that shows green right now. Anything that goes up counts down as well.It's good to be informed about the latest happenings and trends in the crypto space, so investors can be better informed when choosing any coins to put their money in, it's also more important to diligently carry out research before emberking on the journey. The top gainers in the last 24 hours as listed in the OP is not a guarantee that they'll keep pumping and be profitable for investors to rush and buy them, because anything can happen in the coming 24 hours which might change the naretive of their positions. Like you I'll rather stick with  reputable altcoins and Bitcoin that have proven their consistency in the crypto market, knowing that even if they experience price dips that they'll surely pump back with higher ROI.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie

I am a guy who likes to take it safe and not risk everything on something new which may or may not have potential to grow in the future. Yes they might sound new but they literally in the past years already and been using some of them so I dont know how you can say they arent reputable. Maybe you wanted to say is famous? comments.author: tsaroz
comments.body: I was the lucky one to be holding Keep3r at the time. I sold it around $112. Lisk and 1inch are popular coins and many people were bullish on them but it's hard to predict when they'll rise. It is a good idea to invest on multiple promising alts or an index combining those alts. The market today was a bit corrective for most alts and could be a good time to accumulate good coins. Maker and ICP had a good rise as expected but not so much for other.

comments.author: NotHatinJustTrollin
comments.body: Quote from: sheenshane on January 02, 2024, 11:59:26 PMWhy all of them are different tokens that listed on Coinmarketcap.They also have Gainers and Losers tokens.Are they different?The information on tokens from Coinmarketcap and Cryptorank can differ due to each website having their own listing conditions.Quote from: sheenshane on January 02, 2024, 11:59:26 PMPeople who invest in tokens are most likely into gambling to me. I do not even know which of them has potential, so congrats if you invested in all of these but be careful, it will become shitcoin without knowing you. However, to make safe and effective investment decisions, it is important to thoroughly research projects, potential, and the capabilities of the development team for each token, rather than just focusing on tokens that have fast price increases. Investing in tokens is not entirely gambling, but it requires knowledge and careful research to minimize risks.

comments.author: Dave1
comments.body: Quote from: batang_bitcoin on January 02, 2024, 11:10:47 PMLisk was like the oldest here. But ever since it has been launched, the value of it is still the same and even lower from the time it was launched. The ATH of it definitely is high but I doubt it that with pumps like this will make it have a return. I just think that because a coin has pumped, people should invest on it already. Don't get yourselves into FOMO because that will give you a certain loss.And it's weird that they are one of the top gainers unless they have been pump hard because of some news.But just like what the rest of experience traders who doesn't take risk or at least not into the pump and dump scheme, it's no surprises that we will see unknown projects being pump and it could be just part of some groups who hype this coin, create a so called demand and then sell when it is the highest.No complain though for investors who are into this kind of action, but for me, I will stay away from this kind of scheme, just saying.

comments.author: tjtonmoy
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoaddictchie on January 03, 2024, 08:44:55 AM~snipWell maybe famous. But yeah, some tokens or coins that have created a reputation and has a good history in the market. I was referring to something like that. As I already said, not all of them but most of them are not famous or reputable. I am not saying that all of them are bad or has no reputation. While choosing we can choose some from the list but not all.Every investment in altcoin market carries a risk but if it's famous and have a good history of being in the market for a long time, then we can somewhat trust that project for investment. But that does not fully make it non-risky. Also you cannot judge a full project's reputation based on 24 hours gains. But it is good to see how good they are doing.
